metadata.title: CVE-2018-11782 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In Apache Subversion versions up to and including 1.9.10, 1.10.4, 1.12.0, Subversion's svnserve server process may exit when a well-formed read-only request produces a particular answer. This can lead to disruption for users of the server.

criterions.comment: subversion package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.10.6-1').
